section.heading: Authority of the Chief Financial Officer.
section.text: The Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia shall exercise authority over the Corporation consistent with §§ 1-204.24a through 1-204.24f.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 substituted “§§ 1-204.24a through 1-204.24f” for “§§ 1-204.24a, 1-204.24b, and 1-204.24c.”
